comment._content: Louis Cayle: This is the only information I could find through Google. Alfred T. Palmer (1906-1993) from www.geh.org/ (George Eastman House).

comment._content:
a great and wonderful photo.

i take my hat off to all those men and women who fought for our freedom, and of which a lot paid for that freedom with their lives. 
i say thanks to those photographers who show us those sacrifices that the men and women of the allied forces made so that could have the life we do today.
